attributes.additional_details: If Rishi Sunak truly believes his plan is the right one, then let him put it to the people and give him a mandate.
attributes.background: Theresa May and Boris Johnson called elections to get a democratic mandate for their programme of Government. This petition is asking Rishi Sunak to do the same so we can vote on who we want in Parliament and Government.
